)

#SOURCE_GROUP("Source Files\\BasicUsageEnvironment" FILES ${BASIC_USAGE_ENVIRONMENT_SRCS})
#SOURCE_GROUP("Source Files\\groupsock" FILES ${GROUPSOCK_SRCS})
#SOURCE_GROUP("Source Files\\liveMedia" FILES ${LIVE_MEDIA_SRCS})
#SOURCE_GROUP("Source Files\\UsageEnvironment" FILES ${USAGE_ENVIRONMENT_SRCS})

#SOURCE_GROUP("Header Files\\BasicUsageEnvironment" FILES ${BASIC_USAGE_ENVIRONMENT_HEADERS})
#SOURCE_GROUP("Header Files\\groupsock" FILES ${GROUPSOCK_HEADERS})
#SOURCE_GROUP("Header Files\\liveMedia" FILES ${LIVE_MEDIA_HEADERS})
#SOURCE_GROUP("Header Files\\UsageEnvironment" FILES ${USAGE_ENVIRONMENT_HEADERS})

#ADD_LIBRARY( live555 STATIC ${LIVE555_SRCS} ${LIVE555_HEADERS})

ADD_LIBRARY( BasicUsageEnvironment STATIC ${BASIC_USAGE_ENVIRONMENT_HEADERS} ${BASIC_USAGE_ENVIRONMENT_SRCS})
ADD_LIBRARY( groupsock STATIC ${GROUPSOCK_HEADERS} ${GROUPSOCK_SRCS})
ADD_LIBRARY( liveMedia STATIC ${LIVE_MEDIA_HEADERS} ${LIVE_MEDIA_SRCS})
ADD_LIBRARY( UsageEnvironment STATIC ${USAGE_ENVIRONMENT_HEADERS} ${USAGE_ENVIRONMENT_SRCS})

# Build live555 test progs
SET(BUILD_LIVE555_TESTPROGS true)
IF (BUILD_LIVE555_TESTPROGS)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(testProgs)
ENDIF (BUILD_LIVE555_TESTPROGS)
